entry.title: Statoscope: A Course Of Intensive Therapy For Your Bundle
entry.summary: Statoscope is an instrument that analyses your webpack-bundles. Created by Sergey Melukov, it started out as an experimental version in late 2016, which has now become a full-fledged toolkit for viewing, analyzing, and validating webpack-bundles.
